items.summary: Update the Articles content data so the additional articles requested by the user are included in the Articles list and can be opened in the Article Detail view. Add each new article to frontend/src/data/articles.ts with a unique slug, English title, preview, full content, author, date, and a valid image path.

If any of the newly added articles require new images, add those image files as static frontend assets under frontend/public/assets/ (or frontend/public/assets/generated if generated) and reference them via the Article.image field so images load correctly on both the Articles list and Article Detail pages.
